attributes.action: Hold a 2nd EU referendum on the basis that Vote Leave lied to the British public
attributes.additional_details: Companies are leaving. The pound has fallen. FTSE has lost £120bn. This is all in the first 24 hours. Keep us on the steady path of the EU, hold a second, more honest, more informed referendum to protect our people and prove we are #StrongerInEurope
attributes.background: 48.1% of people are being forced out of the EU by a misled campaign. They lied about the NHS, immigration and the economy. They have no plan and 51.9% is not enough of a majority. The EU ref should have also included 16 year olds who pay taxes and die for our country.
